pages.text: Default fluid transfer amount is 1 bucket. You can use upgrades to increase it.$(br2)Fluid nodes can retrieve fluids in the world, but can only retrieve the source. It can also interact with cauldrons, but can only insert/extract by 1 bucket, and can only carry water and lava. Placing fluid on ground requires $(l:concepts/a2_upgrades)place upgrade$(/l).

Fluid nodes support $(l:concepts/a1_filter)filter$(/l) through right click with bucket, fine tune amount through $(l:concepts/a3_wands)configuration wand$(/l), and open complex filter UI for full control.$(br2)In filter UI, right click filter slot with fluid bucket, or drag fluids from JEI into filter slot to set filters.$(br2)You can specify if you want to care about fluid NBT or not.
